mapper.select: select a.id, a.display_name, a.host_id, a.status, a.back_up_time, a.create_time, a.mode, a.disk, u.username, b.real_host_id from back_up_detail a join cloud_host b on a.host_id = b.id left join sys_user u on b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.type = #{type} order by create_time desc
select a.id, a.display_name, a.host_id, a.status, a.back_up_time, a.create_time, a.mode, a.disk from back_up_detail a WHERE host_id = #{hostId} and status = 1 order by back_up_time desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert INTO back_up_detail (id,display_name, host_id, status,back_up_time, create_time,mode,disk) values (#{id},#{displayName}, #{hostId},#{status},#{backUpTime},#{createTime},#{mode},#{disk});
